home.title: Sound Designer
home.subtitle: Film & Television Audio Post-Production
home.intro: I'm Felipe Valencia (Felo). As a sound engineer specialized in audiovisual post-production for film, television, and media, my role is to translate the director's vision by applying my technical knowledge and taking it further by combining it with the passion I've developed for cinema. This gives a distinctive touch to the projects I work on, which I carry out with care and satisfaction to deliver what is shown on screen and heard through the speakers — what the product technically requires, guided by my professional perspective.
home.knowMore: Want to know more about me?
home.bio: Sound engineer with skills in editing and mixing for audio post-production, with experience in the film, television and media industry. Graduated as a sound engineer and professor at ITM University (Medellín) for the multimedia engineering and sound engineering programs.
